hero_tag: I build things for the web.
hero_description: I'm a software engineer based in Paramaribo, Suriname, specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional websites, applications, and everything in between. Currently i'm building user-driven port logistics based solutions at
about_personal: Hello! I'm Shayant, a software engineer based in Paramaribo, Suriname.
about_passion: I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.
about_school: Currently i'm studying Software Engineering at the
about_bacholar: where i'll soon recieve my bacholar.
about_work: Late 2021 i joined the development team at
about_workdesc: where I work on a wide variety of interesting and challenging projects on a daily basis.
about_tech_title: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:
project_fp_1_desc: A webapp built for getting up to date and easily readible COVID-19 data. View infection numbers by country/province or state(US). View the ammount of infections on a map or read the FAQ
project_fp_2_desc: A mobile app built to find the closest recycle point based on your location in Suriname
project_fp_3_desc: A website built to offer educational videos on different primary school subjects. This application allows students who have a hard time understanding a subject to get a different explanation from a different source
contact_body: Although I'm currently not looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
